text: The concept of human rights in Mozambique is an ongoing issue for the African country. ==LGBT Human rights== Mozambique, along with other former Portuguese colonies, is one of the most LGBT-friendly African nations. Polls have found moderate levels of support for LGBT rights and same-sex marriage. Nevertheless, same-sex couples are unable to marry or adopt, and LGBT people still face discrimination and prejudice. == Notes == Mozambique Category:Mozambique
title: Human rights in Mozambique
